title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 303.3 - Soliciting rides
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 303.3 - Soliciting rides

State Regulations

No person, on property over which the authority exercises
jurisdiction, shall solicit a ride, or solicit from, or sell to, an occupant of
any vehicle. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
303.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
